5#ifndef CYD_UI_PROFILING_H
6#define CYD_UI_PROFILING_H
7
8#include <chrono>
9#include <optional>
10#include <unordered_map>
11#include <thread>
12#include <mutex>
13#include <shared_mutex>
14#include <cstring>
15#include <utility>
16
17using namespace std::chrono_literals;
18
19
20namespace prof {
21 constexpr std::size_t PROFILING_THREAD_NAME_SIZE = 32;
22 constexpr std::size_t PROFILING_TIMELINE_SIZE = 10000;
23
24 using PROFILING_CLOCK = std::chrono::steady_clock;
25
26 using namespace std::chrono;
27
28 using time_point = std::chrono::time_point<PROFILING_CLOCK>;
29 using duration = std::chrono::duration<PROFILING_CLOCK>;
30
31 struct event_t {
32 const char* description;
33 time_point t0;
34 std::optional<time_point> t1 = std::nullopt;
35
36 inline void mark_start() {
37 t0 = PROFILING_CLOCK::now();
38 }
39
40 inline void mark() {
41 mark_start();
42 }
43
44 inline void mark_end() {
45 t1 = PROFILING_CLOCK::now();
46 }
47 };
48
49 using thread_timeline_t = std::array<event_t, PROFILING_TIMELINE_SIZE>;
50
51 struct thread_context_t {
52 char name[PROFILING_THREAD_NAME_SIZE] {};
53
54 inline void add_event(event_t ev) {
55 timeline[insert_index] = ev;
56 insert_index = insert_index + 1;
57 if (insert_index >= PROFILING_TIMELINE_SIZE) {
58 insert_index = 0;
59 }
60 }
61
62 thread_timeline_t timeline {};
63
64 private:
65 std::size_t insert_index = 0;
66 };
67
68 struct context_t {
69 inline void mark_event(const char* ev_desc) {
70 event_t ev;
71 ev.description = ev_desc;
72 ev.mark();
73
74 auto id = std::this_thread::get_id();
75 add_thd(id);
76 std::shared_lock lk {mtx};
77 threads[id].add_event(ev);
78 }
79
80 inline event_t start_event(const char* ev_desc) {
81 event_t ev;
82 ev.description = ev_desc;
83 ev.mark_start();
84 auto id = std::this_thread::get_id();
85 add_thd(id);
86 return ev;
87 }
88
89 inline void end_event(event_t ev) {
90 ev.mark_end();
91 std::shared_lock lk {mtx};
92 threads[std::this_thread::get_id()].add_event(ev);
93 }
94
95 struct scope_event_t {
96 scope_event_t(
97 context_t* ctx,
98 const char* ev_desc
99 ): ctx(ctx) {
100 ev.description = ev_desc;
101 ev.mark_start();
102 }
103
104 ~scope_event_t() {
105 ev.mark_end();
106 auto id = std::this_thread::get_id();
107 std::shared_lock lk {ctx->mtx};
108 ctx->threads[id].add_event(ev);
109 }
110
111 private:
112 context_t* ctx;
113 event_t ev {};
114 };
115
116 inline scope_event_t scope_event(const char* ev_desc) {
117 auto id = std::this_thread::get_id();
118 add_thd(id);
119 return {this, ev_desc};
120 }
121
122 inline void add_thd(std::thread::id id) {
123 std::unique_lock lk {mtx};
124 if (!threads.contains(id)) {
125 threads[id] = {};
126 }
127 }
128
129 std::shared_mutex mtx;
130 std::unordered_map<std::thread::id, thread_context_t> threads {};
131 };
132}
133
134#endif //CYD_UI_PROFILING_H
